title: wait a miniute....
body:
so i was talking to a personal friend when i was saying all this obviously it was toxic becasue we talk like this 2 each other 
My account - Zeljin
please look over this and please realize ididnt mean it i dont need a perma ban.... ever  since i got the 14 day suspention i dont even call other people bad names or words i just tell them to shh.. please understand that this wasnt put towards a random stranger but i know this guy so please unban it or give it a 30 day suspension i really like my account.

replies.body:
You were trash talking your entire team, not just one person, and none of them appear to be your friend.

Additionally, you were given numerous punishments and in your last one you were informed it was your final warning.
"none of them appear to be your friend." forever alone and smited LOL
Savage

but if even friends are stresssed out at times i dont mean to talk like that honestly i have tried so hard to not start fighting with my team because i know what it causes. this game was a normal and he was getting mad over it. i understand what i did was wrong but i didnt mean it i just need 1 more chance or u can perma mute my acccount i dont care i dont need 2 talk to people please i just want it back.

stop with your "friends" bullshit he just said the game you got banned for you played without any friends.
and you had 3 chances, the 10 game chatrestrict, the 25 game CR and the 14day ban.
make a new account, or uninstall the game and save yourself the space

why is it bullshit im guessing u havent been out much andthats why u dont understand. people like 2 "fuck with each other" its a term that when ur with a real friend u can actually call them dipshits or dumassses and instead of taking it seriously they laugh becasue they know we are cool.... bullshit u say? get a real life.

its bullshit because A RIOT EMPLOYEE SAID YOU DIDNT PLAY WITH FRIENDS you dont understand that right?

also the way you talk to me shows how toxic you are and that the ban is deserved, im glad you will stay permabanned no matter what lies you bring up :D
you know that what you just said is a selfown right? rofl.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=burrito88
This is his "other" account but he claims it's his brothers. If that's true, thats a clear violation of ToS.

> [{quoted}](name=Pararnore,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Q0PIojds,comment-id=00020002000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-02T20:40:32.927+0000)
>
> http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=burrito88
> This is his "other" account but he claims it's his brothers. If that's true, thats a clear violation of ToS.

what are u a fucking stalker? get off my nuts why are u trying to keep me away from a game i love? are u toxic?
About a week ago you added me and were super toxic towards me and then told me you had an alt named Zeljin, then I saw this post :)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Awk moment when you bring your case to the public, and it instead brings witnesses against you.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
he deleated it tell me what he said :^)

he said he doesnt care about the bann because he has a 2nd account who is also stuck in bronze and that he is way better than me at the game.
i think due to his bad english he wanted to say that im stuck in bronze or something, dunno lol

not really, your english is a shame and i learned english for 3 years and say that lol.
and the way you talk im pretty sure most americans here are ashamed that they share the same region with you.
there is no problem. you are toxic as fuck, you dont understand it, YOU ARE BANNED problem solved :D

your grammar and your english is a disaster, my worst classmates learned better english in those 3 years than you in your whole life mr. "ima so cool ima phrase hardcore street gangsta shiat"

now enjoy your permabann, im gonna play some aram ;DD WITH MY FRIENDS BECAUSE I CAN!!!
noone understand a single word of what you say! no wonder ppl dont get what you mean.
save urself the space and get off my topic?
and he wonders why he's banned XD XD XD (for the record, I go where I damn well please, think of me as Mundo)

"You were given numerous punishments and in your last one you were informed it was your final warning"

You had your one more chance. You obviously didn't try very hard not to fight with teammates, because you kept doing it.

You reap what you sow. Take it like an adult and move on.

Next time people tell you it's your last chance, take it seriously.
what u mean u dont ever ever say things 2 ur teammates? like thats a dumb idea or ur stupid? those thigns are obviously offensive and i bet  u have so dont judge
No, I think those things. I don't type them. It's called self-control. It's really not an advanced concept. [Just. Don't.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3wRS5to_Jo)

> [{quoted}](name=Little Mac is OP,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Q0PIojds,comment-id=00020002000100010000,timestamp=2016-03-02T21:09:59.395+0000)
>
> No, I think those things. I don't type them. It's called self-control. It's really not an advanced concept. [Just. Don't.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3wRS5to_Jo)

o ok
one time after 15 days? dont u think thats an improvement? fuck people get mad at the game what else u cant hold ur anger inside its not healthy for u
When you couldn't even play the game for 14 of those, no.

You were given time to improve, you did not improve enough.

If your account is so important you're willing to beg and plead and look pathetic on the forums, why isn't it important enough to get you to shut your mouth ingame?

Id say u had your chance. 

Well, u had way more than only one chance.

Enough is enough.

> [{quoted}](name=zeljin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Q0PIojds,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2016-03-02T20:09:50.971+0000)
>
> but if even friends are stresssed out at times i dont mean to talk like that honestly i have tried so hard to not start fighting with my team because i know what it causes. this game was a normal and he was getting mad over it. i understand what i did was wrong but i didnt mean it i just need 1 more chance or u can perma mute my acccount i dont care i dont need 2 talk to people please i just want it back.

LOL.
And you can always tell someone's age when this happens...

also this is the only game iv ever really said stuff like that since i was came back from my ban which was 15 days ago. dont you think after 15 days 1 flame diserves maybe a chance? i honestly didnt mean it.. i want my champions runes and mastiers im a player that can see the differnt aspects of the game Please understand. give it a 2 month ban if you want or 3 month but please give it back to me i had it since season 1.

-off topic (taric xin bot lane taric mass armor xin glass cannon pure dmg and attack speed taric mass armor 2 give xin armor + ult when xin ap raito was op would make xin really really powerful almost like a ADC the shatter also reduces enemy armor so like armor pen. with a stun heal and xin heal and knock up its a good bot lane..... havent tried it out becasue i wanted to do it with a good support that knew how to adapt. gettting xekes with that and zhonyas on taric it would be marvelous.


please riot i honestly didnt mean it mute my chat forever plz!!!!!!!!!!!!!

They aren't going to go back on this. Many have tried. Only one has ever succeded in getting unbanned, and that's because his account was OBVIOUSLY hacked when riot looked into it. Honestly, you're not even making one of the more convincing arguments. You keep contradicting yourself. It's apparent that you are just making it up as you go in an attempt to find the magic phrase that you feel will get you unbanned.
you got roasted by rito itself, ouch

> [{quoted}](name=Abatrox,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Q0PIojds,comment-id=00020006,timestamp=2016-03-02T21:37:13.023+0000)
>
> you got roasted by rito itself, ouch

ya it sucks.... o well i still know im better then anyone at this game so its cool

>
> ya it sucks.... o well i still know im better then anyone at this game so its cool

You're gold so I would say there are probably a few people who are better than you.
he is banned on the boards anways, after insulting almost everyone lol

im sure you are
